sections.content:
**Summary:**
- You don’t really need anything, just a mower and you can source that from parents, friends etc.
- It’s one of the easiest ways to start making money
- It can be scaled into a million-dollar business

**Action steps:**
- Continue the course

Why is lawn mowing a great side hustle?

a It's the most popular way to make money

b You don't need any skill and you can make moneybags now -

c It requires no effort

•


2️⃣ **Lawn Mowing Course - Module 2** 2️⃣ 

"What Equipment Do You Need?"

**Summary:**
- Push mower: ask your parents to borrow theirs or buy one for you
- You can tell them it’s to make some money and learn sales skills
- Rake & Broom: stand out by clearing up after you’ve cut
- Trash bags: to collect up the clippings and leaves

**Action steps:**
- Acquire access to a mower, a rake, and plastic bags

What equipment do you need to cut lawns?

a Just a mower
b You don't need any equipment
c Push mower, rake, broom and trash bags

**Summary:**
- Start at $15-$30 or equivalent for your country
- It depends on the size of the lawn
- You have the advantage when it comes to price because you’re young so you don’t have many expenses

**Action steps:**
- Decide on a price for your prospect’s lawn

**Summary:**
- Go door-to-door in your neighborhood
- Offer to cut their yard and tell them your price
- You can go online and post a listing
- Create a flyer, print it out, and deliver it to houses in your neighborhood

**Action steps:**
- Create and print out a flyer
- Start going door-to-door and offering your services

Why is lawn mowing a great side hustle?

a It's the most popular way to make money
b You don't need any skills and you can earn moneybags now
c It requires no effort

**Summary:**
- To take on more clients, after you start picking up more clients
- Get your friends to do more lawns and drake a little cut from their jobs
- They get paid, you get paid and your client gets their lawn taken care of - everyone wins

**Action steps:**
- Hire your friends to scale your lawn care business

How do you take on more lawn mowing clients?

a Work 25 hours per day

b Hire your homies-

C Stop mowing and start freelancing

**Free Canva Template for Pamphlet**

You will need to make a Canva account to view it, (it’s FREE)

[Options 1](https://www.canva.com/design/DAFYWSO7QE4/TRKKhLBmuuJ99JNbluB4vw/view?utm%3Ci%3Econtent=DAFYWSO7QE4&utm%3C/i%3Ecampaign=designshare&utm%3Ci%3Emedium=link&utm%3C/i%3Esource=publishsharelink&mode=preview)

[Options 2](https://www.canva.com/templates/EAEu4-NNxRo-professional-green-lawn-care-tear-off-flyer/)

**The Next Step**

Your next step is to download the pamphlet I mentioned.

Then simply fill in the information.

Then tell the professors or others that you're starting your lawn care business.

After that, GET TO WORK.

Nothing happens until you make it happen.

Are you going to implement the Lawn Care Course?

a Yes, I'm ready to make my first $100
